title: True Dummy - a fable of existence
description: A story of two ordinary boys and their quest to conquer the world, True Dummy engages with questions about existence, ambition and the meaning and purpose of life while addressing the most soul-searching dilemmas of the human race. This enlightening fable takes you on a timeless journey with its thought provoking narrative, delightful short stories and allegorical landscapes with extraordinary images.Delve into the mysteries of existence and life and discover a fantastic world imbued with philosophical insights in Ashish Jaiswal's True Dummy a magical tale about the deepest human ambitions.A story of two ordinary boys and their quest to conquer the world, True Dummy engages with questions about existence, ambition and the meaning and purpose of life while addressing the most soul-searching dilemmas of the human race. This enlightening fable takes you on a timeless journey with its thought provoking narrative, delightful short stories and allegorical landscapes with extraordinary images.Delve into the mysteries of existence and life and discover a fantastic world imbued with philosophical insights in Ashish Jaiswal's True Dummy a magical tale about the deepest human ambitions.
author: Ashish Jaiswal
